title: Iconic motorcycle brand BSA makes India debut; launches 652-cc model at Rs 2.99 lakh
description: Classic Legends under Mahindra Group unveiled the BSA Gold Star 650 model in India, starting at Rs 2.99 lakh. Competing with Royal Enfield Interceptor 650, this 652-cc model marks BSA's entry in the Indian market. Acquired in 2016, BSA motorcycles were reintroduced in Europe, and bookings are now available through select Indian dealers.
